components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Touch Network in Lebanon

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Touch Network in Lebanon. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Receipt Delays to Claro Network in Brazil

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in delivery report delays when sending SMS to the Claro Network in Brazil. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending to the Claro Network in Brazil. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Dashboards (Messaging Services) and Messaging Insights Page via Console May Include Stale Data

incident_updates.body: We continue to investigating the issue where stale data may be present on some of the dashboards(Messaging Services) on Messaging Insights Page via Twilio Console. We expect to provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Multiple Networks over Multiple Countries in Africa

incident_updates.body:
It has been determined that there are additional Countries and Network Operators impacted other Network Operators are back to operational, below is a list of currently known Network Operators experiencing delivery delays and/or failures:

- Cameroon: Orange 
- Ecuatorial Guinea: Orange
- Ivory Coast: Moov
- Liberia : Celcom
- Niger: Etisalat

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
It has been determined that there are additional Countries and Network Operators impacted, below is a list of currently known Network Operators experiencing delivery delays and/or failures:

- Cameroon: Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange
- Gambia: Comium
- Ivory Coast: Moov
- Niger: Etisalat
- Tunisia: Tunisie Telecom

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
It has been determined that there are additional Countries and Network Operators impacted, below is a list of currently known Network Operators experiencing delivery delays and/or failures:

- Burkina Faso: Orange
- Cameroon:  Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange
- Ghana: Vodafone
- Gambia: Comium
- Ivory Coast: Orange, MTN, Moov
- Niger: Etisalat
- Sierra Leone: Africel

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
We are still observing degradation for these two networks:

- Burkina Faso: Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange

Additionally, we are still experiencing SMS delivery delays to the following Network Operators and Countries: Orange Cameron, Orange Ivory Coast, MTN Ivory Coast, Moov Ivory Coast, Etisalat Niger and Africel Sierra Leone. We will continue to monitor and will provide an update within 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:

- Burkina Faso: Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are seeing recovery for Network Operators and Country: Orange Burikina Faso, Orange Equatorial Guinea and Vodafone Ghana, while we are still experiencing SMS delivery delays to the following  Network Operators and Country: Orange Cameron, Orange Ivory Coast, MTN Ivory Coast, Moov Ivory Coast, Etisalat Niger and Africel Sierra Leone. We will continue to monitor and will provide an update within 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body:
We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to Multiple Networks and Countries in Africa. 

Our engineers are working with our carrier partners to resolve the Incidents for each affected Country. The following Countries and respective Network Operators are impacted:

- Burkina Faso: Orange
- Cameroon:  Orange
- Equatorial Guinea: Orange
- Ghana: Vodafone
- Ivory Coast: Orange, MTN, Moov
- Sierra Leone: Africel

We will provide an update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, March 23rd, 2024, at 2:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 3 hours. During the maintenance window, ETL loads will be affected.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - MegaFon

incident_updates.body: The MegaFon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 March 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 25 March 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon Russia

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 March 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 25 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States SMS Carrier Maintenance - AT&T

incident_updates.body:
The AT&T network in united states is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 25 March 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 29 March 2024 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T united states handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

25 March 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 26 March 2024 at 04:00 PDT
26 March 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 27 March 2024 at 04:00 PDT
27 March 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 28 March 2024 at 04:00 PDT
28 March 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 29 March 2024 at 04:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Interconnect Maintenance (Australia)

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting planned maintenance from 12 April 05:00 until 12 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio Network Exchange in Sydney, Australia (AU1). During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact to services with Interconnects in AU1.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Voice Maintenance (Australia)

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 April 05:00 until 12 April 12:00 PDT on the Twilio network. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent impact on calls to and from Australia / New Zealand.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Voice Maintenance (Australia)
